text: Ne olwayoola khumaatsi ka Madyana, yanyoola omukanda kwa Abandu nikunywesinjia, na nanyoola mumbeka wabu abakhasi babili bekalilanga (emiruko chiabu okhunywa) Musa naboola mbu: “mukhabeele murie?” boosi babili nibaboola mbu: “shikhwakhanywesia tawe okhula shingala abandi abo banywesia, mana bakalusieyo emiruko chiabu ne papa wefu ni omukofu muno.”
